t: Celtic Frost - To Mega Therion (2-LP, 180 Gram Vinyl) - Amazon.com Music
s: How unreal, pure genius, truly ... 80's. Celtic Frost has an ageless sound, one which will never fade away. Enjoy! Packaging, not what I expected from Amazon and not how other albums arrived, ever. Not packaged very well, was in a much too large box without any other protection, free to shift and bang around, the LP cover was not damaged amazingly enough. This may be due to another item being shipped with it, some sleeves for vinyl records, hence ...

t: Celtic Frost - Morbid Tales (2-LP, 180 Gram Vinyl) - Amazon.com Music
s: Vinyl brings me back to 1986-7 stoner high school years. ... I have known Celtic Frost since I was in Jr high school .. I am 47 years old this month. I've had many versions of this album (cassettes , cds) I can safely say this will be the "be all .. end all" version. It's in a hardcover book format ...

t: CELTIC FROST - Into The Pandemonium - Amazon.com Music
Amazon.com: Celtic Frost - To Mega Therion - Lp Vinyl Record: CDs & Vinyl
s: Celtic Frost had a huge influence on Darkthrone, Goatwhore, and even death metal pioneers Obituary. A lot of folks like Morbid Tales the most, but this album is much more refined, and the vocals are a step up...to me the aforementioned album has Tom Araya undertones.
